name: City Car Driving Sim
description:
Are you ready to be a city driver? You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a car. Cruise around the city in your car, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting.

Features:
∙ Multiple race cars
∙ Simple and intuitive controls
∙ Amazing 3D graphics
∙ A realistic and precise driving experience
